ewani siddhin nisa methek athishaya sarthaka lesa merata sidu karagena aa prathishakthikarana wada piliwela pilibanda janathawa thula athi wishwasaya paludu wima nowalakwiya hakiya.dakunu aasiyawe hondama menma lowa hondama prathishakthikarana wadasatahanak bawata path wannata ape prathishakthikarana wadasatahanata hethu wu yodha shakthiya ee pilibanda janathawa thula pawathi akhanda wishwasayayi.eki wishwasaya hethu kota gena rajaye prathishakthikarana wadasatahanakin merata janathawa labu prathilabha nirogi janathawak lesa ada api bhukthi windimin sitimu.parikshana pawathwa saba thaththwaya handuna gena warada siduwi athi thanata piliyam yodanu wina samastha prathishakthikarana wadasatahana pilibandawama saka sanka upadawa gena prathishakthikaranayen walaki sitima da nuwanathi kriyawak nowe.rubella yanu rogayak lesa salakana kala etharam barapathala dussadhya rogayak nowe.
